resources.string: Hello blank fragment
Complete ‘Free Upgrade’ to start receiving Pickup Requests and delivering parcels for Real Money!
Complete your account profile
I\'m Unavailable today for insta Same-Day deliveries
Connect with a delivery partner and get \nyour items and goods delivered in no timer
Re-enter the OTP" we sent to phone number to authenticate this process.
Find out locations state we \noperate and our policies
To change information, please contact \ncustomer service
Upgrade to delivery partner
Please Complete the following to proceed
Connect with a delivery partner, get your items, goods, etc., picked up & delivered right on time, every time
Connect with neighbors and businesses near you, help pickup & deliver their packages and get paid ‘in-app’ instantly
Sign up and create a parcel pickup request, invite friends and family to do the same, to earn points.
Complete “Free Upgrade” to DP\nstatus now

How do you make money on FreeXit? It’s easy! You create your daily, weekly and monthly route (this means places and locations you go regularly or few times) you get a request to pickup parcel, deliver within those routes you created, and then get paid. By doing so you become a Delivery Partner. Follow through the process and enjoy the experience.
You receive request on the colored dates. You can adjust the date(s) or day(s) in the map
To Notify you via text, once this Request is matched to a Delivery Partner (DP), please input your mobile phone number
Please enter the 4-digit code sent to you\nat +2349012345678
To start receiving pickup request and\ndelivering parcel on this route. Upgrade to\nDelivery partner (DP) status.
FreeXiT
